study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: International experience shows that co-operatives can be an effective instrument for poverty alleviation
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Personal experience in China has shown that international co-operative approaches can be applied with success and promising results achieved

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: as the povertyalleviation programme is modified taking into account the changing nature of poverty in the country
evidence_citations.country_citation: To date, the development of co-operatives in China has played only a very minor role in poverty-alleviation efforts
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: To achieve good governance and ensure food security and environmental protection in rural areas would require a breakthrough in the development of rural co-operatives
